channel.title: Rainbow static death animation
channel.description:
#### What happened?
1st, when looking at a death animation, it was essentially rainbow static. When logging back in, I was booted out again
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to not crash and see the animation as intended
#### Steps to reproduce: 1: Look at a death animation 2: crash 3: Crash again by logging in.
#### Comments:
Windows 7 user

item.title: Rainbow static death animation
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
What happened?

1st, when looking at a death animation, it was essentially rainbow static.
When logging back in, I was booted out again

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I was supposed to not crash and see the animation as intended

Steps to reproduce:

1: Look at a death animation
2: crash
3: Crash again by logging in.

Comments:

Windows 7 user
